tool_description: A tool for user authentication, allowing users to log in, log out, and retrieve user information.

api_list.name: listBoxServices
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of services available in a grid format.

required_parameters.name: session
required_parameters.description: The session identifier for the user.

api_list.name: logout
api_list.description: Log out the user from the session.

required_parameters.name: session
required_parameters.description: The session identifier for the user.

api_list.name: getInfoJSON
api_list.description: Retrieve user information based on the session.

required_parameters.name: session
required_parameters.description: The session identifier for the user.

api_list.name: Get Token
api_list.description: Obtain a token using the user's email and password.
